title: Enhancing Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Strengthening Mathematical Decision-Making Capabilities through Intelligent Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can model real workplace problems with 80% accuracy using mathematical optimization techniques.
Learners can perform and evaluate decision-making simulations at least three times based on data collected from VR simulations.
Learners can analyze individual learning data to develop personalized learning plans and achieve a completion rate of 90% or higher.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
